snippet: With a 11-4 record in November, Nets Coach Avery Johnson was selected as the Eastern Conference coach of the month.
lead_paragraph: With a 11-4 record in November, Nets Coach Avery Johnson was selected as the Eastern Conference coach of the month.

headline.seo: Nets’ Avery Johnson Is Named East Coach of the Month
headline.main: Nets’ Early Success Earns Johnson Coach of the Month Honor
headline.print_headline: Nets’ Early Success Earns Johnson Coach of the Month Honor
